title: Workflow4Metabolomics
text:
Important



Workflow4experimenters () course 2025 : Registration are now closed !


Welcome to the collaborative portal of  dedicated to metabolomics data processing, analysis and annotation for the Metabolomics community. On this website you will find information on our main missions as well as users and developpers guides.

Keep in touch
You can subscribe to our newsletter to get updated on new events !


Fast access










Galaxy instance


Here is the Galaxy workflow4metabolomics website

Resources


  
    
    
      Newcomer
      I'm a newcomer and I want to know more about , visit our Introduction section and Guide for Users
    
  
  
    
    
      Want to learn
      
      
        Go to our teaching school event  section
        Consult our user page here
        Or directly go to our official Galaxy training guides 
      
      
    
  


  
    
    
      Contributers
      
      
        A tutor to help people understand how to process metabolomics data see here
        A developper to propose or add new tools to the community:
          
            Check our Guides and how-to
            I need help:  create an issue
          
        
        
        I don't know but I want to help: workflow4metabolomics@proton.me
      
      
    
  
  
    
    
      Reporters
      
        
          The galaxy instance, post an issue on the IFB Communit Support
          On this website, post an issue on Github website
        
      
    
  



I want to know who is behind all of these, go to our team member section.
